page.title: 06Sunday at Home-Stamford Br.
page.content: On Sunday I get up at 9.00am.At 10.00am there is a pigeon shoot.After that we have sandwiches.My dad serves behind the bar in the pub.We sell drinks and meals.The pub closes at 4.00pm.Sunday is a busy day.Then we have our tea.Sometimes I play with Katy while my mum does the washing.Then I watch television.At 9.30pm I go to bed but mum and dad have to serve in the bar until 11.30pm.My mum or the chef prepares and cooks the food in our pub.My favourite food is fish and chips.On Sunday we had chicken,carrots,cabbage, potatoes,and Yorkshire puddings.I have a hampster called Sandy and a cat called Smudge.I also have a dog called Milly.Sometimes she acts silly. By Claire Moody:The Gold Cup.Low Catton.
